title: Opposition to the Temple
summary: Enemies of Judah try to halt the rebuilding of the temple through discouragement and political interference. Eventually, they succeed in getting an official order to stop the work, which is delayed for many years.

faq.question: Who opposed the rebuilding efforts?
faq.answer: The local adversaries who feared the Jewsâ€™ return and strength.

faq.question: What was the result of their opposition?
faq.answer: The temple work was halted until a new king ruled.
